name: Indoor games Lite
description:
***** "A big variety of indoor games allows you to play in any company with any number of friends in all kind of life situations"

***** "Now you can get out of your computer and spend some quality time with your friends, your family and your loved ones"

***** "Indoor Games is al you need - a bit of warmth, love and good mood .."

Fun games for all! Party and drinking games. Games for two and games for boring classes and meetings. Games for ice breaking and games for getting closer. Choose a number of participants and get an indoor game description which you will definitely like!

Indoor games app is best for couples and noisy companies alike. It is a great tool for guides, counselors, teachers, leaders, camp workers and everybody working with people.
